Name: Pastini
Review Text: September 18th.  What a joy this place is. Be sure to book as it is small. Great view to the canal. Great food and wonderful staff. A truly enjoyable evening.

Name: Pastini
Review Text: Amazing restaurant. From the food to the 5 star service. And great prices too for a restaurant this good and with prime location

Name: Pastini
Review Text: The restaurant is cosy but very small. The food was good but the portions were too small for the price! The wine is a bit expensive as well but nice. I way a bit shocked by the toilets right next to the kitchen...

Name: Pastini
Review Text: The ambience was so cute with the windows looking over the canal and the food was amazing. The curry pasta was the perfect amount of spice and the bolognese was flavorful. Highly recommend.

Name: Pastini
Review Text: Friendly staff, classy decor and thoughtful dishes.   Definitely the highlight of our trip to Amsterdam. My only regret is that we didn't find this place earlier on our trip.

Name: Pastini
Review Text: Delicious food and relaxing place. The mora dessert and black muscat were amazing. Will bring my granny when she visits - that's my ultimate compliment! :-)
